name: Trivet
description:
These trivets are created from burlap off-cuts lined with 100% cotton batting.

What in the world is a trivet?  Basically a big coaster placed underneath a hot pot or plate to protect your table.

* re-purposed from a local coffee roaster's jute burlap 
* lined with padded cotton batting
* in one-of-a-kind pattern
* different pattern on each side
* 5" w x 5" h

name: A Truly Canadian Pen
description: For that on-the-go executive or as a speaker gift at conferences and AGMs: a truly Canadian pen crafted from local area maple by Paul Ross Woodturning. A real conversation starter. Includes: * stylish protective carrying case in blue * Parker refillable ink * HST Also by Paul Ross at his Bloomfield shop: bowls and hollow vessels great for weddings and anniversaries.

name: One Red Hot Basket!
description: For that special spice lover, for the guy (or gal) who likes it hot. * NEW for 2013: Choice of Chipotle BBQ Sauce or Thai Hot and Sweet Sauce from Prince Edward County Fare * Cayenne Cheese Pennies from The Merrill Inn * Spiced Pecans from The Merrill Inn * Dark Chocolate Ginger Bark from Copper Kettle * Organic Cinnamon Honey from Honey Pie * 3 hour long beeswax tealights from Honey Pie * $2 coupon for Primitive Cuisine: Local meat served up Southern BBQ style Comes standard in eco-friendly gift box or upgrade to our Bounty Basket from the menu above. All prices INCLUDE HST.

name: GIFT WRAPPING
description: Individual gift items come unwrapped. They will be shipped in protective materials but will need to be gift wrapped by the recipient once received. If you are shipping directly to a gift recipient, you have 2 options for gift wrapping (select from dropdown menu): OPTION A Item wrapped in simple recyclable brown kraft paper and elegant eco-friendly ribbon. $1.99 per item. OPTION B Item placed in an elegant white eco-box with recycled packing materials and finished with eco-friendly ribbon. $3.99 per box.

name: Knitter's Basket
description: Crafted by Kathryn Orok Designs near Bloomfield, this cozy felted basket with tweed handles can be filled with your favourite knitter's favourite wools and yarns. * colours and patterns vary * choose a colour preference from the menu above * 8" x 6" GIFT WRAPPING OPTIONS

name: Cinnamon Honey
description: Honeypie Hives and Herbals blends ground organic cinnamon with local Prince Edward County wildflower honey for the ultimate cinnamon toast topping. Delicious on pancakes too! * Choice of 3 sizes - select from dropdown menu above. * Wildflower, buckwheat, lavendar and cranberry honey also available. Email us for pricing. GIFT WRAPPING OPTIONS

name: Winter Berries Greeting Card
description: From the studio of encaustic artist Susan Wallis, this greeting card features a new recipe for Holiday Cranberry Coconut Chews (not in The Art of Herbs cookbook) * comes with envelope and protective sleeve * 5.25" x 5.25" * HST included Add a personalized greeting for $2.99.

name: ADD A GREETING
description: To add a personalized touch when sending a County Gift Co. gift or basket, type your own greeting to the recipient in the NOTE TO SELLER box upon checkout. We will handwrite your greeting in a card of your choosing: ART OF HERBS WINTER BERRIES SCENES OF PRINCE EDWARD COUNTY

name: Soap Preserves
description: Nestled cozily in antique canning jars, these guest-size soaps display nicely in the bathroom or kitchen. A little something for your favourite employee or teacher. Soaps include: * Tomato basil * Cucumber Lime * Carrot Cornmeal * Lemon Poppyseed * Seasalt and Pepper * Almond Honey * Lavendar and Buttermilk From former Prince Edward County soapmaker Big Tub Botanicals recently relocated to St. John, New Brunswick. HST included. GIFT WRAPPING OPTIONS

name: Pinecones Three
description: You won't find these beeswax candles growing on trees, but Honey Pie Hives and Herbals makes them by hand on their Pt. Petre farm. * 100% pure clean beeswax with cotton wicks, no added scent * Burn longer, cleaner and brighter than paraffin - 14 hours * 3 in a set or sold separately * HST included GIFT WRAPPING OPTIONS

name: Farm Picnic Napkins
description: ONLY 3 SETS LEFT! No formal dining here, these napkins are screenprinted with rustic fork knife and spoon in non-toxic ink. * Set of 4 napkins * Made of 100% natural unbleached muslin cotton * Screenprinted with non-toxic ink by a local artist * Use for picnics, everyday or when company comes to call * HST included ADD TO FIELD TO TABLE BASKET OR BREAKFAST FOR SIX if you wish. GIFT WRAPPING OPTIONS

name: Bounty Basket - Sweet and Low
description:
These Prince Edward County made baskets were coffee sacks in a past life.

* repurposed from a local coffee roaster's jute burlap
* lined with soft muslin cotton
* in one-of-a-kind pattern or standard beige

Can be reused to hold 4-5 toilet paper rolls * balls of yarn * magazines * handtowels * whatever you can think of 

10" w  x 10" d x 4" h

name: A Wee Cutting Board
description:
Fashioned from sustainably harvested maple or cherry wood by a local woodworker, these cutting boards are finished with a food-safe beeswax.  Approximately 12" x 6".  Sizes vary.

Add a couple chunks of local cheese and spreader and you've got a unique hostess gift for under $40.  

Only 3 left in stock!  HST included.

name: Bounty Basket - Small
description: These Prince Edward County made baskets were coffee sacks in a past life. * repurposed from a local coffee roaster's jute burlap * lined with soft muslin cotton * in one-of-a-kind pattern or standard beige * 6" w x 6" d x 5" h Can be reused to hold 14 cds * children's books * small photo albums * keepsakes * brushes and combs PURCHASE SEPARATELY OR UPGRADE ANY GIFT BASKET BY SELECTING OPTION FROM THE DROP DOWN. ALSO AVAILABLE IN LARGE.

name: The Art of Herbs Cookbook
description: The Art of Herbs is a unique collection of Susan Wallis’ encaustic paintings paired with herb-infused recipes from personal chef and food writer, Cynthia Peters, owner of From the Farm Cooking School. A lovely keepsake from Prince Edward County. * With 21 recipes and paintings. * Perfect for art & food connoisseurs alike. * Purchase separately or as part of our Field to Table gift basket. GIFT WRAPPING OPTIONS

name: From the Farm Shopping Bag
description: Take this sturdy all-natural jute shopping bag on your next farm fresh foray. * comfort cotton grip with handles * 16" wide, 14" high, 6" deep * laminated inside for durability and easy cleaning * artful embroidery by local talent Embroidery Uniquely Yours From the Farm offers the region's ultimate field to table culinary experience in Chef Cynthia Peter's 1830s Hillier farmhouse. GIFT WRAPPING OPTIONS

name: Bounty Basket - Large
description: These Prince Edward County made baskets were coffee sacks in a past life. * repurposed from a local coffee roaster's jute burlap * lined with soft muslin cotton * in one-of-a-kind pattern or standard beige * 8" w x 8" d x 6" h Can be reused to hold 4-5 toilet paper rolls * balls of yarn * magazines * potted plants (waterproof lining not included) PURCHASE SEPARATELY OR UPGRADE ANY GIFT BASKET BY SELECTING OPTION FROM THE DROP DOWN. ALSO AVAILABLE IN SMALL.

name: Artisan Soap and Dish
description: An elegant pair indeed. Amarais Artisan soap with an exclusively designed dish by Wellington Pottery. Crafted in small batches, Amarais soaps are gentle and pure and suit even the most sensitive of skin types. * choice of Lavender, Lemongrass or Ginger Citrus soap * dishes are lime green, lavender, pale yellow, teal or charcoal PLEASE NOTE YOUR DISH COLOUR PREFERENCE IN THE "NOTES TO SELLER" AT CHECKOUT. GIFT WRAPPING OPTIONS

name: Itsy Bitsy Spa
description:
For that favourite teacher or employee.  Warm them up with a tiny assortment of these locally handcrafted bathables.  

* 2 Mini Artisan Soaps
* 2 Handcrafted Herbal Teas
* Butter Nut Body Balm
* Vanilla Tub Truffles
* Vanilla Hemp Lip Balm  
* Eco-soy tealight

HST included
Comes standard in eco-friendly gift box with lid
Measures 5" w x 4" h

name: A Candle Holder for Wine Lovers
description:
Crafted by one of Canada's two remaining cooperages from the belly of former wine barrels, these Carriage House white oak candle "staves" hold three Honeypie beeswax tealights just right. 

Great for:

* housewarmings
* hostess gifts
* holidays
* weddings

Approximate dimensions 16" long x 2.25" wide x 2" high (each holder is unique).

PURCHASE HONEYPIE BEESWAX TEALIGHTS SEPARATELY FROM THE DROPDOWN MENU ABOVE.  COME 9 TO A PACK.

name: Breakfast for Six
description: Can't make it down to The County for breakfast? Why not bring The County home to you? Just cook up some pancakes or waffles, add County Garden seasoning to eggs, milk to Granola and you've got Breakfast for Six! * Organic Spelt Flour by Cherryvale Farms * Luscious Dark Maple Syrup by JC Nyman Farms * Handmade Granola by Michael Sullivan of The Merrill Inn * County Garden Seasoning by Honey Pie * Organic Local Garlic * Choice of Strawberry/Vanilla Bean or Fuzzy Navel Peach Jam by The Merrill Inn * Spelt Waffle Recipe HST is included. Comes standard in an eco-friendly box with lid. UPGRADE THIS GIFT - ADD OUR BOUNTY BASKET FROM THE DROPDOWN MENU ABOVE.

name: A Field to Table Basket
description: For the special foodie in your life - a new art cookbook from Prince Edward County, local ingredients to bring the recipes to life and beeswax candles to cook by. Included in this basket: * The Art of Herbs by Susan Wallis and Cynthia Peters * Maple syrup from JC Nyman Farms * Norm Hardie pinot noir mustard from East & Main Bistro * Organic Spelt flour, garlic, shallot from Cherryvale Farms * County Garden seasoning from Honey Pie * Two beeswax beehive candles from Honey Pie * Spelt Waffle recipe HST included. Comes standard in an eco-friendly gift box with lid. UPGRADE THIS GIFT - ADD OUR BOUNTY BASKET FROM THE DROPDOWN MENU ABOVE.

name: The Almost Edible Spa
description: ALMOST GOOD ENOUGH TO EAT! Light a "farm-fresh" candle, nibble on some chocolate-dipped sponge toffee and slip into an experience that will soothe the senses and revitalize the soul. * Fresh Lemon Body + Bath Oil - Amarais Artisan * Honey Bee Good Lotion - Essential Relaxation * Pumpkin Pie Soap - Honey Pie Hives and Herbals * Goat Milk with Sweet Basil + Lime - Amarais Artisan * Apple Pie Lip Balm - Honey Pie * Vanilla Hemp Lip Balm - Essential Relaxation * "Farm-fresh" Egg Beeswax Candle - Honey Pie * Chocolate-dipped Sponge Toffee - Copper Kettle HST included. Comes standard in an eco-friendly gift box with lid. UPGRADE THIS GIFT - ADD OUR BOUNTY BASKET FROM THE DROPDOWN MENU ABOVE.

name: Art of Herbs Recipe Card
description: Choose a beautiful greeting card showcasing one of six paintings from encaustic artist Susan Wallis and The Art of Herbs cookbook. * Each card features a new recipe on the back (not in cookbook) * Sold individually or in multiples of 4 cards * Comes with envelope and protective sleeve * 5.25" x 5.25" * HST included Add a personalized greeting for $2.99 or email usto see additional images.

name: Scenes of Prince Edward County Greeting Cards
description: Picton artist, Ruby Young, drew the sugar shacks of local maple establishments for the 10th anniversary of Maple in the County, but her repertoire includes so much more! * unique scenes of Prince Edward County finely detailed and meticulously produced * images of favourite heritage buildings, inns and wineries * includes envelope and protective sleeve * 7" w x 5" h * HST included ALL SALES BENEFIT HOSPICE PRINCE EDWARD. Add a personalized greeting for $2.99 or email us for additonal images.
